div.class: p-3 py-3 d-flex flex-row align-items-center justify-content-between

h6.class: m-0 font-weight-bold h3 mr-3 ks_list_view_heading text-capitalize

div.class: ks_dashboard_item_button_container ks_dropdown_container ks_dashboard_item_header ks_dashboard_item_header_hover chart_button_container d-md-flex d-none

button.title: Move/Duplicate
button.class: ks_dashboard_item_action dropdown-toggle kpi-tile-img img-bg hover-item me-lg-2

ul.class: ks_dashboard_menu_container form-input-box form-control encapsulated-form-arrow dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-right

button.title: Quick Customize
button.class: ks_dashboard_quick_edit_action_popup kpi-tile-img d-sm-block d-none img-bg hover-item me-lg-2

button.title: Info
button.class: ks_item_description dropdown-toggle img-bg hover-item me-lg-2 kpi-tile-img

button.title: More
button.class: ks_dashboard_item_action_export img-bg hover-item me-lg-2 kpi-tile-img dropdown-toggle
